name: stoic.
headline: Stoic helps people feel better and take care of their mental health.
description:
We are on a mission to help people understand what influence how they feel and what they can do to feel better.

Stoic has more than 3 000 000 downloads, 50 000 reviews with a 4.8/5 average and you can find it here http://apple.co/-stoic and here http://apple.co/stoic

founders.name: maciej lobodzinski, Founder
founders.description:
I build stoic — a mobile app that helps people feel better and gives them insights into their mental health.

Previously I created Prismake (acquired by Tango Agency) — a software agency where I helped companies like dscout, Talixo, and Roam Robotics with their iOS apps.

raw_markdown="[stoic.](https://getstoic.com/</>)
[About](https://getstoic.com/</about>)[Blog](https://getstoic.com/</blog>)[Quotes](https://getstoic.com/</quotes>)[Testimonials](https://getstoic.com/</testimonials>)[Help](https://getstoic.com/<https:/help.getstoic.com>)
[Download](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/download>)
# Journaling made easy
Find guidance, get inspired, start writing.
[![Download on the App Store button.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/645f72ed7dfa8db5bacd3e81_Apple%20Store%20Badge.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/download>)
It's free!
[![TechCrunch logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/64d511bd15ee32276eb24f3c_TechCrunch-Logo.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/techcrunch>)[![YCombinator logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/64f0a975d640c3ad36fe263b_YC%20Logo%20Expanded%20%E2%80%94%20Orange.svg)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/yc>)[![Product Hunt logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/64d5122c87868bc626fc41c8_Product_Hunt_Logo.svg)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/stoic-5>)[![Apple App of the Day badge.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/5df27464245d00facfb975d3_stoic_laurse.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/apple>)
![An illustration depicting the core feature of the stoic mental health journal app which is a 'Morning Preparation' and an 'Evening Reflection' which is a deep-rooted practice in Stoicism.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/65fc7397c1ee07a9c4b1392e_hero.webp)
![A screenshot of the stoic mental health app's guided journaling tab with a description for a gratitude journal.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/65fc80088e8ffe98212d252a_journal.webp)
## Guided journals for every topic.
Journal about anything and everything, freeform or with hundreds of guided journal prompts on productivity, stress & anxiety, therapy, relationships and more.
NEW FEATURES
## Use AI to reflect and journal better.
Get AI-powered writing analysis, personalized guided journal prompts, smart reminders, and more.
[LEARN MORE](https://getstoic.com/</ai>)
![A screenshot of the stoic mental health journaling app showcasing it's AI feature about writing analysis prepared by Seneca.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/65e87a27cc41d9e6f8b947bd_ai-1.webp)
![Screenshot of the 'Journaling Suggestions' feature in Stoic, powered by Apple's new API, displaying personalized prompts that inspire users to journal about life's moments. The example shows a photo prompt for 'Tuesday December 5' suggesting users to write about their experiences, capturing the essence of personal storytelling and reflection within the best journal app.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/659824d9659298cc83f7845c_suggestions.webp)
ONLY ON iOS 17.2+
## Journaling Suggestions for you.
Get personalized suggestions based on events that happened in your life, places you visited, photos in your library, songs that you have on repeat, and more.
ALSO IN DARK MODE
## Be equipped to feel your best.
With a library of 100+ science-backed exercises prepared by professional therapists to make you feel better.
![A dark mode screenshot of the stoic mental health journal app for iOS with a list of science-backed exercises, guided meditations, quotes, and affirmations to help you improve your sleep, including lessons from Huberman Labs and the Sleep Foundation.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/65fc80a3799829aa0f842d8c_evening.webp)
![A screenshot from the stoic mental health app where you are being asked about the quality of sleep which is a part of their sleep tracking and mood tracker features.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/65fc805d27dd464175cdace6_sleep.webp)
## Work on what matters to you the most.
Whether it’s dealing with anxiety, better sleep, or being more productive, we have the tools for you.
## And so much more...
We're constantly adding new guided journals, guided meditations, breathing exercises, and other tools to help you improve your mental health.
![A QR code that one can scan using their phone to download the stoic mental health journal app for iOS, macOS, iPadOS, and visionOS.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/6616e86d1ebb069b695ad97e_scan-qr.webp)
Get hundreds of guided journals, exercises, quotes, and more for free in stoic!
[![Download on the App Store button.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/645f72ed7dfa8db5bacd3e81_Apple%20Store%20Badge.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/download>)
### Join 3,000,000+ people on their journey
Personalize stoic to be your own mental health companion.
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/6446afd7b52f348a41277830_90ab935fdc9f30249be15fb70a88b5ca-sticker.webp)
I don’t think I’ve ever come across a journaling app like **stoic** that has so many features, exercises, interactive aspects, and impactful quotes.
Daphne
on the App Store
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/644800783d664af30f93d1fc_98e151954629d9555659578223590f09-sticker.webp)
I have tried so many apps and ways to journal. But most of them focus on a rigid structure than being inspirational.The way **stoic** has helped me interact and engage to write more was phenomenal.
noodleMind
on the App Store
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/6448008c23f57dcb6fd0a19f_fa20630b0eae3f16b7902f1f594af820-sticker.webp)
**stoic** has to be the best journaling app I’ve seen so far. Its clean, works super well.It's just about perfect and it’s exactly what I wanted from a journaling app.
MyselfGoose
on the App Store
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/644801844d13776f60f74266_be08243b737d98db76a3f7423df90165-sticker.webp)
**stoic** has really helped me grow and has helped me become a better person.This app is making so many people’s lives better.
SpiritKaizen
on the App Store
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651fd3ac92f9ba32691b5ef2_memoji1.webp)
**stoic** redirected my focus from external chaos to internal clarity during a rough phase. It didn't just light up my path, but taught me how to keep the light on, reminding me I control my life's narrative.
KVSupernova
on the App Store
![Memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651fd44a28d1ed82add82dcc_memoji2.webp)
**stoic** gently guides towards personal reflection, making mindfulness a simple, personalized routine, enhancing emotional wellness.
CheeseNinjaIPA98
on the App Store
![a memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651ff5dda906d1517858f3e6_memoji3.webp)
**stoic** has been a cornerstone in easing my anxiety and depression, providing a convenient platform to build healing habits amidst coping with various mental health issues.
kajlan98
on the App Store
![A memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651ff6ccf679fee7c49f264f_memoji4.webp)
**stoic** has turned journaling on my phone into a joy, helping find peace and positivity amidst daily stress, even while battling depression and anxiety. Highly recommended!
Chryssee
on the App Store
![A memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651ff8e9fdd81b215ba57a34_memoji7.webp)
**stoic** has woven itself into my daily routine, providing focused start to my days with its thoughtful prompts. It's been my go-to for clarity and calm, especially during challenging moments post brain surgery.
Squirrel Schenandoah
on the App Store
![A memoji of a stoic user.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/651ffc6635c0b9ca477828fa_memoji10.webp)
**stoic** emerged as a beacon of hope amid my therapist search hindered by Medicare constraints. Its unmatched intuitiveness has been pivotal in reclaiming my mental health from deep depression. Life-saver.
Mellyberry84
on the App Store
[See more testimonials](https://getstoic.com/</testimonials>)
### Start journaling with stoic today.
Get hundreds of guided journals, mental health tools, and more for free!
[![Download on the App Store button.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/645f72ed7dfa8db5bacd3e81_Apple%20Store%20Badge.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/stoic.li/download>)

[![Twitter logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5df252114bb8c8dafbed787d/6474c6cd43eec2cf6982b6f0_twitter.webp)](https://getstoic.com/<https:/twitter.com/stoicapp>)

generated_description:
**Stoic: Improving Mental Health, One Journal Entry at a Time**

Founded in 2019 and hailing from Kraków, Poland, Stoic is on a mission that resonates deeply in our fast-paced world: to help people understand their emotions and enhance their mental well-being. Stoic is not just another journaling app; it’s an experience designed to empower users to reflect, feel better, and engage more deeply with their thoughts and emotions.

With over **3 million downloads** and an impressive **4.8 out of 5** rating from **50,000 reviews**, the Stoic app clearly strikes a chord with users. The app combines guidance, inspiration, and the tools needed for effective journaling—whether it be about productivity, stress, anxiety, or relationships.

### What Makes Stoic Stand Out?

1. **Personalized Journaling Features**: Stoic's approach includes AI-powered writing analysis and personalized guided journal prompts that enrich the user’s experience. This isn't the rigid structure of typical journaling apps; it's fluid, adaptable, and inspiring.
   
2. **Extensive Library of Exercises**: The app boasts **100+ science-backed exercises** designed by professional therapists to help users feel better. From guided meditations to breathing exercises, there’s no shortage of tools available.

3. **Innovative AI Features**: Leveraging the latest technology, Stoic offers users automatic journaling suggestions based on their life events, photos, and moments, making reflection truly personal.

4. **Community-driven**: With over 3 million users, Stoic is more than an app; it's a community. Users share their experiences and testimonials showcasing tangible improvements in their mental health.

5. **Accessibility**: Available for free, Stoic allows anyone to prioritize their mental health without financial barriers. 

### Trust and Recognition

Stoic is part of **Y Combinator’s S19 batch**, a testament to its innovative potential. This partnership hasn’t gone unnoticed; the app has been highlighted as Apple’s App of the Day and featured on platforms like TechCrunch and Product Hunt.

As Stoic continues to expand and refine its offerings, it remains dedicated to its core mission: enhancing the emotional health of its users. If you’re searching for a companion to help you navigate your mental landscape, download the Stoic app ([here](https://getstoic.com/)) and join a growing journey towards introspection and mental wellness.

---

In brief, Stoic taps into what people truly need—tools that guide them through their feelings and foster a healthier mindset, all delivered through a user-friendly approach that feels more like a supportive friend than a tool.
